errors.message: Chuffed proved the FlatZinc model has no solution
errors.cause: Constraints conflict or data is inconsistent

solutions.code: % drop symmetry or side constraints temporarily
solutions.when: Need to find the conflicting rule

errors.message: Search stopped due to restart/failure limits
errors.cause: Search parameters too aggressive for instance size

solutions.approach: Use randomization to escape heavy tails
solutions.when: Search stuck in same part of tree
Weak constraints leave large search space

errors.message: Propagation removed all values from a variable domain
errors.cause: Combination of constraints leaves no legal value for a variable

solutions.when: Implicit domains become negative or too wide

solutions.code: constraint x + y <= limit; constraint x >= 0; constraint y >= 0;

solutions.when: Guard constraints that may not always apply

errors.message: FlatZinc global not implemented by Chuffed build
errors.cause: Model uses a global constraint outside Chuffed support set

solutions.code: % replace regular with explicit transition constraints

solutions.when: Other solver supports the needed global

errors.message: Solver ran out of memory during search
errors.cause: Very large search tree or model size exceeds available RAM

solutions.approach: Limit search time and memory use
solutions.when: Need to keep resource usage bounded

solutions.code: % aggregate identical tasks instead of modeling each individually
solutions.when: Model size itself is too large
